org.hibernate.search.elasticsearch.util.impl

Class ElasticsearchDateHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.search.elasticsearch.util.impl.ElasticsearchDateHelper

  • public final class ElasticsearchDateHelper
extends Object
    Various utilities to manipulate dates and comply with Elasticsearch date format.
    Author:
    Guillaume Smet

      • round

        public static Calendar round(Calendar calendar,
                             DateTools.Resolution resolution)
        Limit a calendar resolution.
        Parameters:
        calendar - The calendar whose resolution is to be limited
        resolution - The desired resolution of the date to be returned
        Returns:
        the calendar with all values more precise than resolution set to 0 or 1
        See Also:
        DateTools.round(Date, Resolution)
